@ijuma Thank you for the review. I haven't moved throttle-time to the response header as explained in the previous comment. One alternative to making the code in `KafkaApis` neater would be to make `throttleTimeMs` a non-final field. That way the response could be created as it is now, and throttle time can just be updated in the response. I didn't want to do that initially because it makes the code inconsistent, but perhaps that is ok for this case?
